title: Endurance of Dwarves (2U4)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Vitality:	+1
Game Text:	Bearer must be a Dwarf. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make bearer strength +1.
Lore:	”'Dwarves too can go swiftly, and they do not tire sooner than Orcs.'”
Rarity:	U
